feed.title: JHM Lab.
feed.subtitle: Optimal Transport, Topology of Singularities, Physics.

entry.title: Einstein and Maxwell
entry.summary: Einstein SR, Homogeneous Wave Equation, Lorentz Group, Maxwell.

entry.title: GR + OT. Part 1.
entry.summary: How to apply Optimal Transport (OT) to General Relativity (GR). The answer depends on GR defining energy and work, including some commentary on Prof. McCann's 2020 article.

entry.title: Alexandrov and Souls. Part 1.
entry.summary: Very brief update on a work in progress. Studying the problem of souls on singular Alexandrov spaces.

entry.title: Yao’s Millionaire’s Problem. Part 1.
entry.summary: We begin the study of Yao's Millionaire Problem, approaching via convex analysis. Two players have secret points, and the first player to guess an affine function separating the secrets wins. The question is whether the optimal strategy is uniform on the domain, or whether there is some variation in the density. This is elaborated below using both python and some elementary convex analysis.

entry.title: Note on Economics of Moving and Delivery. Part 1.

link.title: Note on Economics of Moving and Delivery. Part 1.

entry.summary: How to save money on moving and delivery? Basically prepare and pack as much as possible into as many closed cardboard boxes as necessary, and order a very large truck for transport.
